theHighwayman:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theHighwayman:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theHighwayman:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theHighwayman:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theHighwayman:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theHighwayman:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theHighwayman:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theHighwayman:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theHighwayman:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theHighwayman:ENERGY_DAMAGE! Damage total.)

theHighwayman:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theHighwayman:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theHighwayman:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

theHighwayman:VigorousCard.NAME: Vigorous
theHighwayman:VigorousCard.DESCRIPTION: At the start of every turn, gain 1 thehighwayman:Ammo. NL thehighwayman:Ammo charges stack.

theHighwayman:TrackingShot.NAME: Tracking Shot
theHighwayman:TrackingShot.DESCRIPTION: thehighwayman:Fire. NL Deal !D! Damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable 3 times. NL Exhaust.

theHighwayman:Grapeshot.NAME: Grapeshot
theHighwayman:Grapeshot.DESCRIPTION: thehighwayman:Fire. NL Deal !D! Damage to ALL enemies.

theHighwayman:DoubleBarrel.NAME: Double Barrel
theHighwayman:DoubleBarrel.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 thehighwayman:Ammo. NL The next card played that thehighwayman:Fires is played twice. NL Exhaust.
theHighwayman:DoubleBarrel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 thehighwayman:Ammo. NL The next card played that thehighwayman:Fires is played twice.

theHighwayman:CycleOfViolence.NAME: Cycle of Violence
theHighwayman:CycleOfViolence.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you take unblocked attack damage, gain 1 thehighwayman:Riposte.

theHighwayman:Hemorrhage.NAME: Hemorrhage
theHighwayman:Hemorrhage.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! thehighwayman:Bleed. NL Activate bleed scaling.

theHighwayman:WhiskeyShot.NAME: Whisky Shot
theHighwayman:WhiskeyShot.DESCRIPTION: Tastes like thehighwayman:Fire. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL You cannot gain thehighwayman:Ammo

theHighwayman:PrecisionStrike.NAME: Precision Strike
theHighwayman:PrecisionStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Apply thehighwayman:Bleed equal to unblocked damage dealt.

theHighwayman:BleedOut.NAME: Bleed Out
theHighwayman:BleedOut.DESCRIPTION: Activate thehighwayman:Bleed Damage, then reapply the thehighwayman:Bleed.

theHighwayman:DuelistsRetreat.NAME: Duelist's Retreat
theHighwayman:DuelistsRetreat.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a card from your hand on the top of your deck.

theHighwayman:PointBlank.NAME: Point Blank Shot
theHighwayman:PointBlank.DESCRIPTION: thehighwayman:Fire. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Deal !D! Damage.

theHighwayman:Cartridge.NAME: Cartridge
theHighwayman:Cartridge.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! thehighwayman:Ammo. NL Exhaust.

theHighwayman:QuickWork.NAME: Quick Work
theHighwayman:QuickWork.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.

theHighwayman:SliceUp.NAME: Slice Up
theHighwayman:SliceUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put the card from the bottom of your deck into your hand.

theHighwayman:UpClose.NAME: Up Close
theHighwayman:UpClose.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have no thehighwayman:Ammo, gain [E] [E].

theHighwayman:AndPersonal.NAME: And Personal
theHighwayman:AndPersonal.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have no thehighwayman:Ammo, draw 2 cards.

theHighwayman:Ricochet.NAME: Ricocheting Shot
theHighwayman:Ricochet.DESCRIPTION: thehighwayman:Fire. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

theHighwayman:UncannyReflexes.NAME: Uncanny Reflexes
theHighwayman:UncannyReflexes.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain thehighwayman:Riposte, gain !M! Block.

theHighwayman:ExcellentFormCard.NAME: Excellent Form
theHighwayman:ExcellentFormCard.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, put 1 card from your deck into your hand.
theHighwayman:ExcellentFormCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, put 1 card from your deck into your hand.

theHighwayman:TriTipDagger.NAME: Tri Tip Dagger
theHighwayman:TriTipDagger.DESCRIPTION: Bleed instead loses half of it's stacks when activating damage.

theHighwayman:Finesse.NAME: Unparalleled Finesse
theHighwayman:Finesse.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn draw 1 card and put 1 card to the bottom of your deck.

theHighwayman:RevolverShot.NAME: Revolver Shot
theHighwayman:RevolverShot.DESCRIPTION: thehighwayman:Fire. NL Deal 12 damage X times.
theHighwayman:RevolverShot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thehighwayman:Fire. NL Deal 12 damage X+1 times.

theHighwayman:QuickDraw.NAME: Quick Draw
theHighwayman:QuickDraw.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 thehighwayman:Ammo. NL Add 1 card that thehighwayman:Fires from your deck to your hand. NL Exhaust.
theHighwayman:QuickDraw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain 1 thehighwayman:Ammo. NL Add 1 card that thehighwayman:Fires from your deck to your hand. NL Exhaust.

theHighwayman:CardUpSleeve.NAME: Card Up Your Sleeve
theHighwayman:CardUpSleeve.DESCRIPTION: Put the card from the bottom of your deck into your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
